metadata.title: CVE-2022-47520 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.0.11. Missing offsetvalidation in drivers/net/wireless/microchip/wilc1000/hif.c in the WILC1000wireless driver can trigger an out-of-bounds read when parsing a RobustSecurity Network (RSN) information element from a Netlink packet.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1').
